Egyptians live a new moment in the glorious revolution of January 25th, in which they protect their revolution so insistently that the clock can not be allowed to turn back.

Yesterday, Egypt witnessed a number of millions of millions that can not be ignored, calling for the rejection of violence by civilized performance to affirm the awareness of Egyptians and their adherence to the course of the peaceful revolution.
